data.name: WWE 2K22 - nWo 4-Life Edition Bonus Pack
data.detailed_description:
Hey yo! The WWE 2K22 nWo 4-Life Edition Bonus Pack is just too sweet. Receive playable nWo Superstars, two awesome arenas, the nWo Wolfpac Championship, 1 MyFACTION “Gold” Pack & more.

This pack comes with:
  • MyFACTION EVO Cards and playable nWO versions of “Hollywood” Hulk Hogan, Scott Hall, Kevin Nash, and Syxx
  • Eric Bischoff’s playable character, including his MyFACTION EVO Card
  • Souled Out 1997 and Bash at the Beach 1996 arenas
  • The nWo Wolfpac Championship
  • 1 MyFACTION “Gold” Pack bundled with nWo EVO cards

The WWE 2K22 nWo 4-Life Edition Bonus Pack is included in the WWE 2K22 nWo 4-Life Edition.

data.short_description: The WWE 2K22 nWo 4-Life Edition Bonus Pack is just too sweet, with playable nWo Superstars, two arenas, nWo Wolfpac Championship & more!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550 / AMD FX 8150 (AVX - Compatible processor)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: At least 4 GB Video Memory
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 / AMD FX 8350 (AVX - Compatible processor)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: At least 6 GB Video Memory
